mapper.select: SELECT fy_purchase_detail.goods_quantity,bd_material.* ,(bd_measdoc.name)measdoc FROM fy_purchase_detail,bd_material,bd_measdoc WHERE fy_purchase_detail.pk_material=bd_material.pk_material AND fy_purchase_detail.fy_purchase_id=#{purchase_id} and bd_measdoc.pk_measdoc=bd_material.pk_measdoc

SELECT fy_purchase_detail.goods_quantity, bd_material.`name`, materialspec, bd_material.materialspec, (bd_measdoc.`name`)unit, fy_quote.pk_supplier_id, (SELECT bd_supplier.`name` FROM bd_supplier WHERE bd_supplier.pk_supplier=fy_quote.pk_supplier_id)company, fy_quote.* FROM fy_purchase_detail,fy_quote,bd_material,bd_measdoc WHERE fy_purchase_detail.quote_id=fy_quote.id AND fy_purchase_detail.pk_material=bd_material.pk_material AND bd_material.pk_measdoc=bd_measdoc.pk_measdoc AND fy_quote.id=fy_purchase_detail.quote_id and fy_quote.fy_purchase_id=#{purchase_id}
